title: Linux Mint 17 v2 Cinnamon x64
description:
MD5: 3d8c3c3e82916e2110f965111b0ee944



Recently, Clement Lefebvre has updated Linux Mint 17 Cinnamon and Linux Mint 17 Mate, releasing some V2 images of the two Linux systems.
Among others, MDM has received some fixes for the non-xrandr GPUs, Driver Manager has received fixes, some fixes regarding the installer that corrupts the APT sources have been corrected and all the bug-fixes added in the latest month have been added to the ISO images.


If you already have '17, no need to download. Run the following commands via your Terminal to upgrade your system.

sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
